titleStmt.title: The new-yeeres gift presented at court, from the lady Parvula to the Lord Minimus, (commonly called Little Jefferie) Her Majesties servant, with a letter as it was penned in short-hand: wherein is proved little things are better then great. Written by Microphilus.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Master.
Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641, attributed name.
Slater, Master, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By N. and I. Okes, dwelling in Little St. Bartholmewes,

notesStmt.note: Microphilus is a pseudonym. Attributed to Thomas Heywood.
"Author identified as 'Master Slater' in an entry in the Registers of the stationers' Company on April 6, 1636."--NUC.
The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
